import {React, useState} from "react"; import {Modal, ModalBody, Container,Form,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Logo from '../img/logo.svg' import Validation from "./Validation"; const TelaLogin = () =>{ const [modal,setModal] = useState({status:false,message:'',variant:'',icon:''}) const [credencial,setCredencial] = useState({user:'',password:''}) const validaDados = ()=>{ let dadosValidacao = {user:credencial.user, password:credencial.password}; let result = Validation(dadosValidacao) console.log(result.message) setModal(prevState=>{return{...prevState,message:result.message,status:true}}) } return ( <> setModal(prevState=>{return{...prevState,status:false}})}> {modal.message}

You System

 Usuário: setCredencial(prevState=>{return {...prevState,user:a.target.value}})}/> Senha: setCredencial(prevState=>{return {...prevState,password:a.target.value}})}/>
) } export default TelaLogin
